hero.title: Become a Sponsor
hero.subtitle: Fuel Innovation & Growth
hero.description: Your support empowers us to build better open-source tools and sustainable software solutions. Join us in shaping the future.

channels.title: Sponsorship Channels
channels.description: Choose the way that best fits your support style.

individual.title: Individual
individual.description: Support us via GitHub Sponsors or Patreon. Great for fans and daily users.

corporate.title: Corporate
corporate.description: Perfect for companies using our tools. Get logo placement and priority support.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: Collaborate on long-term projects and strategic initiatives.

one_time.title: One-time Donation
one_time.description: Make a single contribution via PayPal or Crypto.

donation.title: Direct Donation
donation.description: Directly support our operations with a donation.
